content_rendered:
public static void main(String[] args) {
        class Parent {

            Parent() {
                print();
            }

            void print() {
                System.out.println(10);
            }
        }

        class Child extends Parent {


            void print() {
                System.out.println(20);
            }
        }
        Parent parent = new Child();
    }
